Body:
count = 0
for fq1_read, fq2_read in zip(*(OpenFastq(test_fastqs[0]), OpenFastq(
    test_fastqs[1]))):
    count += 1
    fq1_read_info = sim_data[fq1_read[0].replace('@', '')]
    fq2_read_info = sim_data[fq2_read[0].replace('@', '')]
    self.assertEqual(fq1_read[0].split('/')[0], fq2_read[0].split('/')[0])
    self.assertTrue(check_bases(fq1_read[1], fq1_read_info['cigar'],
        fq1_read_info['ref_strand'], count))
    self.assertTrue(check_bases(fq2_read[1], fq2_read_info['cigar'],
        fq2_read_info['ref_strand'], count))
    sim_regions[f"{fq1_read_info['chrom']}:{round(fq1_read_info['start'], -2)}"
        ] += 1
    sim_regions[f"{fq2_read_info['chrom']}:{round(fq2_read_info['start'], -2)}"
        ] += 1
